parameter.value: event_id
aida_stage
session_clicks
dwell_seconds
ATT000
INT000
DES000
aida_attention_event
aida_intention_event
aida_desire_event

<script>
(function() {
  function toNumber(value, fallback) {
    var num = parseFloat(value);
    return isFinite(num) ? num : fallback;
  }
  var attentionSeconds = Math.max(0, Math.round(toNumber('{{AIDA - Attention Delay (s)}}', 5)));
  var intentionSeconds = Math.max(attentionSeconds, Math.round(toNumber('{{AIDA - Intention Delay (s)}}', 8)));
  var desireSeconds = Math.max(intentionSeconds, Math.round(toNumber('{{AIDA - Desire Min Seconds (s)}}', intentionSeconds)));
  var desireClicks = Math.max(0, Math.round(toNumber('{{AIDA - Desire Click Threshold}}', 3)));
  if (window.__AIDA_SESSION_INIT__) {
    return;
  }
  window.__AIDA_SESSION_INIT__ = true;
  var dataLayer = window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
  function safePush(obj) {
    try {
      dataLayer.push(obj);
    } catch (e) {}
  }
  function nowTs() {
    return Date.now();
  }
  function uuid4() {
    var d = Date.now();
    var d2 = (typeof performance !== 'undefined' && performance.now && (performance.now() * 1000)) || 0;
    return 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx'.replace(/[xy]/g, function(c) {
      var r = Math.random() * 16;
      if (d > 0) {
        r = (d + r) % 16 | 0;
        d = Math.floor(d / 16);
      } else {
        r = (d2 + r) % 16 | 0;
        d2 = Math.floor(d2 / 16);
      }
      return (c === 'x' ? r : (r & 0x3 | 0x8)).toString(16);
    });
  }
  function secondsSince(ts) {
    return Math.max(0, Math.round((nowTs() - ts) / 1000));
  }
  var stageOrder = { 'None': 0, 'Att': 1, 'Int': 2, 'De': 3 };
  var stageEvents = { 'Att': 'aida_attention_event', 'Int': 'aida_intention_event', 'De': 'aida_desire_event' };
  var storage = window.sessionStorage;
  try {
    if (!storage.getItem('aida_session_start_ts')) {
      storage.setItem('aida_session_start_ts', String(nowTs()));
    }
    if (!storage.getItem('gtm_session_click_count')) {
      storage.setItem('gtm_session_click_count', '0');
    }
    if (!storage.getItem('gtm_aida_stage_reached')) {
      storage.setItem('gtm_aida_stage_reached', 'None');
    }
  } catch (err) {
    storage = {
      _data: {},
      getItem: function(key) { return this._data[key]; },
      setItem: function(key, value) { this._data[key] = String(value); },
      removeItem: function(key) { delete this._data[key]; }
    };
    storage.setItem('aida_session_start_ts', String(nowTs()));
    storage.setItem('gtm_session_click_count', '0');
    storage.setItem('gtm_aida_stage_reached', 'None');
  }
  var sessionStart = parseInt(storage.getItem('aida_session_start_ts') || String(nowTs()), 10);
  if (!isFinite(sessionStart)) {
    sessionStart = nowTs();
    try {
      storage.setItem('aida_session_start_ts', String(sessionStart));
    } catch (e) {}
  }
  function getStage() {
    var stored = storage.getItem('gtm_aida_stage_reached');
    return stageOrder.hasOwnProperty(stored) ? stored : 'None';
  }
  function setStage(stage) {
    try {
      storage.setItem('gtm_aida_stage_reached', stage);
    } catch (e) {}
  }
  function getClicks() {
    var raw = parseInt(storage.getItem('gtm_session_click_count') || '0', 10);
    return isFinite(raw) && raw >= 0 ? raw : 0;
  }
  function setClicks(value) {
    try {
      storage.setItem('gtm_session_click_count', String(Math.max(0, value)));
    } catch (e) {}
  }
  var eventIdBase = uuid4();
  function dispatchStage(stageKey) {
    var payload = {
      event_id: eventIdBase + '-' + stageKey,
      aida_stage: stageKey,
      session_clicks: getClicks(),
      dwell_seconds: secondsSince(sessionStart)
    };
    safePush({
      event: stageEvents[stageKey],
      event_id: payload.event_id,
      aida_stage: payload.aida_stage,
      session_clicks: payload.session_clicks,
      dwell_seconds: payload.dwell_seconds
    });
  }
  function maybeFire(stageKey) {
    if (!stageEvents[stageKey]) {
      return;
    }
    var currentStage = getStage();
    if (stageOrder[currentStage] >= stageOrder[stageKey]) {
      return;
    }
    setStage(stageKey);
    dispatchStage(stageKey);
  }
  function checkDesire() {
    if (stageOrder[getStage()] < stageOrder['Int']) {
      return;
    }
    if (secondsSince(sessionStart) < desireSeconds) {
      return;
    }
    if (getClicks() < desireClicks) {
      return;
    }
    maybeFire('De');
  }
  document.addEventListener('click', function() {
    var total = getClicks() + 1;
    setClicks(total);
    safePush({ event: 'aida_click_increment', session_clicks: total });
    checkDesire();
  }, true);
  document.addEventListener('visibilitychange', function() {
    if (!document.hidden) {
      checkDesire();
    }
  });
  setTimeout(function() {
    maybeFire('Att');
  }, attentionSeconds * 1000);
  setTimeout(function() {
    maybeFire('Int');
    checkDesire();
  }, intentionSeconds * 1000);
  setTimeout(function() {
    checkDesire();
  }, desireSeconds * 1000);
  safePush({
    event: 'aida_bootstrap',
    aida_stage: getStage(),
    session_clicks: getClicks(),
    dwell_seconds: secondsSince(sessionStart),
    aida_attention_delay_s: attentionSeconds,
    aida_intention_delay_s: intentionSeconds,
    aida_desire_delay_s: desireSeconds,
    aida_desire_click_threshold: desireClicks
  });
})();
</script>

<script>
(function() {
  var ga4Id = '{{GA4 Measurement ID}}';
  var adsId = '{{Google Ads Conversion ID}}';
  var hasGa4 = ga4Id && ga4Id !== 'G-000000000';
  var hasAds = adsId && adsId !== 'AW-000000000';
  if (!hasGa4 && !hasAds) {
    return;
  }
  var scriptId = hasGa4 ? ga4Id : adsId;
  if (!window.gtag) {
    window.dataLayer = window.dataLayer || [];
    window.gtag = function(){ window.dataLayer.push(arguments); };
  }
  if (!window.__AIDA_GTAG_SCRIPT__ && scriptId) {
    window.__AIDA_GTAG_SCRIPT__ = true;
    var gtagScript = document.createElement('script');
    gtagScript.async = true;
    gtagScript.src = 'https://www.googletagmanager.com/gtag/js?id=' + encodeURIComponent(scriptId);
    var firstScript = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
    (firstScript && firstScript.parentNode ? firstScript.parentNode : document.head || document.documentElement).insertBefore(gtagScript, firstScript || null);
  }
  window.gtag('js', new Date());
  if (hasGa4) {
    window.gtag('config', ga4Id, { 'send_page_view': false });
  }
  if (hasAds) {
    window.gtag('config', adsId);
  }
})();
</script>

<script>
(function() {
  if (typeof window.gtag !== 'function') {
    return;
  }
  var eventId = '{{DLV - event_id}}';
  if (!eventId) {
    return;
  }
  var stage = '{{DLV - aida_stage}}';
  var clicks = parseInt('{{DLV - session_clicks}}', 10);
  var dwell = parseFloat('{{DLV - dwell_seconds}}');
  var payload = {
    event_id: eventId,
    aida_stage: stage
  };
  if (!isNaN(clicks)) {
    payload.session_clicks = clicks;
  }
  if (!isNaN(dwell)) {
    payload.dwell_seconds = dwell;
  }
  window.gtag('event', 'aida_attention', payload);
})();
</script>

<script>
(function() {
  var adsId = '{{Google Ads Conversion ID}}';
  var label = '{{Ads Label - ATT}}';
  if (!adsId || adsId === 'AW-000000000' || !label || label === 'ATT000' || label === 'INT000' || label === 'DES000') {
    return;
  }
  if (typeof window.gtag !== 'function') {
    return;
  }
  var eventId = '{{DLV - event_id}}';
  if (!eventId) {
    return;
  }
  var stage = '{{DLV - aida_stage}}';
  var clicks = parseInt('{{DLV - session_clicks}}', 10);
  var dwell = parseFloat('{{DLV - dwell_seconds}}');
  var payload = {
    send_to: adsId + '/' + label,
    event_id: eventId,
    aida_stage: stage
  };
  if (!isNaN(clicks)) {
    payload.session_clicks = clicks;
  }
  if (!isNaN(dwell)) {
    payload.dwell_seconds = dwell;
  }
  window.gtag('event', 'conversion', payload);
})();
</script>

<script>
(function() {
  var pixelId = '{{Meta Pixel ID}}';
  if (!pixelId || /^0+$/.test(pixelId)) {
    return;
  }
  if (window.fbq) {
    return;
  }
  window.fbq = function(){
    window.fbq.callMethod ? window.fbq.callMethod.apply(window.fbq, arguments) : window.fbq.queue.push(arguments);
  };
  if (!window._fbq) {
    window._fbq = window.fbq;
  }
  window.fbq.push = window.fbq;
  window.fbq.loaded = true;
  window.fbq.version = '2.0';
  window.fbq.queue = [];
  var script = document.createElement('script');
  script.async = true;
  script.src = 'https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js';
  var firstScript = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0];
  (firstScript && firstScript.parentNode ? firstScript.parentNode : document.head || document.documentElement).insertBefore(script, firstScript || null);
  window.fbq('init', pixelId);
  window.fbq('track', 'PageView');
})();
</script>

<script>
(function() {
  var pixelId = '{{Meta Pixel ID}}';
  if (!pixelId || /^0+$/.test(pixelId)) {
    return;
  }
  if (typeof window.fbq !== 'function') {
    return;
  }
  var eventId = '{{DLV - event_id}}';
  if (!eventId) {
    return;
  }
  var stage = '{{DLV - aida_stage}}';
  var clicks = parseInt('{{DLV - session_clicks}}', 10);
  var dwell = parseFloat('{{DLV - dwell_seconds}}');
  var payload = {
    event_id: eventId,
    aida_stage: stage
  };
  if (!isNaN(clicks)) {
    payload.session_clicks = clicks;
  }
  if (!isNaN(dwell)) {
    payload.dwell_seconds = dwell;
  }
  var options = eventId ? { eventID: eventId } : undefined;
  if (options) {
    window.fbq('trackCustom', 'AIDA_Attention', payload, options);
  } else {
    window.fbq('trackCustom', 'AIDA_Attention', payload);
  }
})();
</script>
